description.value:
You've internalized your corporation's culture and strategies, and you're knowledgeable about general business practices. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Additional Lore] general feat for Business or Corporate Lore.

You can use Business or Corporate Lore instead of any other skill when making a Recall Knowledge check about subjects related to your work, such as goods your company buys and sells, individuals or settlements where you do business, or industry laws.

value.value: trained in Deception, Diplomacy, or Society
